name: good-photographer
description: Batch-process headshots: normalize alignment, export standardized formats
author: Alecia Frederick

scripts.build:processor: cd processor && pip install -r requirements.txt pyinstaller -q && pyinstaller -y processor.spec && cd ..
scripts.build:processor:x64: arch -x86_64 bash -c 'cd processor && pip install -r requirements.txt pyinstaller -q && pyinstaller -y --distpath dist-x64 processor.spec && cd ..'
scripts.pack: npm run build:icon && npm run build && npm run build:processor && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist:arm64: npm run build:icon && npm run build && npm run build:processor && electron-builder --mac --arm64 && mkdir -p release && (find dist -name '*-arm64.dmg' -exec cp {} release/ \;)
scripts.dist:x64: npm run build:icon && npm run build && npm run build:processor:x64 && cp -r processor/dist-x64/* processor/dist && electron-builder --mac --x64 && mkdir -p release && (find dist -name '*-x64.dmg' -exec cp {} release/ \;)
scripts.dist:universal: npm run build:icon && npm run build && npm run build:processor && npm run build:processor:x64 && electron-builder --mac --universal --config build/electron-builder-universal.json && mkdir -p release && (find dist -name 'GoodPhotographer-0.1.0.dmg' -exec cp {} release/ \;)
scripts.dist:all: npm run dist:arm64 && npm run dist:x64 && npm run build:processor && npm run build:processor:x64 && electron-builder --mac --universal --config build/electron-builder-universal.json && npm run release
scripts.release: mkdir -p release && cp dist/GoodPhotographer-0.1.0-arm64.dmg release/ 2>/dev/null; cp dist/GoodPhotographer-0.1.0-x64.dmg release/ 2>/dev/null; cp dist/GoodPhotographer-0.1.0.dmg release/ 2>/dev/null; true && echo 'Release folder:' && ls -la release/*.dmg 2>/dev/null || true
